>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/devices/{deviceId}/readings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get device readings

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"deviceId","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"required":true,"description":"ID of the device"},{"in":"query","name":"startTime","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-09-15T10:00:00Z"},"required":true,"description":"the start time of a specific time frame"},{"in":"query","name":"endTime","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-09-16T10:00:00Z"},"required":true,"description":"the end time of a specific time frame"},{"in":"query","name":"resolution","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["15_MIN","1_HOUR","1_DAY"]},"required":true,"description":"Reflects how often the readings are recorded, such as every 15 minutes, every hour, or every day."},{"in":"query","name":"measurement","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["POWER","ENERGY","METER_READING"]},"required":true,"description":"<span><b>measurement</b> reflects the type of readings returned.</span>\n<ul>\n  <li><b>POWER</b> tells you how fast a certain medium (i.e electricity) is being used or produced at a given moment.</li>\n  <li><b>ENERGY</b> is the total amount of a certain medium (i.e electricity) used over a time frame.</li>\n  <li><b>METER_READING</b> is the total amount of a certain medium (i.e electricity) used since the device installation.</li>\n</ul>\n"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"<span>List of the readings of a device.The <b>Direction</b> of a reading can contain two values:</span>\n<ul>\n<li><b>IN</b> means it is a consumption reading</li>\n<li><b>OUT</b> means it is a ingestion/production reading</li>\n</ul>\n","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["deviceId","timeStamp","measurement","value","unit","label","deviceType","deviceProvider","medium","direction"],"properties":{"deviceId":{"type":"string"},"timeStamp":{"type":"string"},"measurement":{"type":"string","enum":["POWER","ENERGY","METER_READING"]},"value":{"type":"number","format":"double"},"unit":{"type":"string"},"label":{"type":"string"},"deviceType":{"type":"string"},"deviceProvider":{"type":"string"},"medium":{"type":"string"},"direction":{"type":"string","enum":["IN","OUT"]}},"title":"DeviceReading"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
